SEARCH
Package com.company.stockmanagement

Class StockValue

java.lang.Object
com.company.stockmanagement.StockValue
public class StockValue extends Object
Represents the values of a stock, including total cost, current value, gains/losses, percentage of gain/loss, and total balance. Provides methods to access and modify these values.
